column4: good night, people! i have a vaio notebook with intel gma965 video driver.... in linux, it cannot run panda samples, but 3d games runs normally
is there any trouble with ubuntu 9.04 and intel gm965 video driver?
intel graphic card issues in 9.04 yes, and it's mentioned in the release notes
so is it.... i having problems to run panda3d samples... but 3d games are running
